title: How to Make Apple Crumble
description:
THE PERFECT *EASY* THANKSGIVING DESSERT!

At its simplest, the apple crumble consists of sliced apples covered with a buttery crispy topping. A baked apple crumble is gooey, bubbly, juicy, and smells incredible. Start with a simple apple crumble, then play with the variations.

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Apple-Crumble

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make an apple crumble first pre-heat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit or 175 degrees Celsius then peel and core 5 to 6 apples cut the apples into 1/4 inch or 0.6 centimeter pieces and spread them out on an 8 inch or 20 centimeter baking dish next combine 2/3 cups or 80 grams of flour 2 tablespoons of granulated sugar 1/2 cup or 100 grams of brown sugar and 1/2 teaspoon of cinnamon in a large mixing bowl cut 6 tablespoons of chilled unsalted butter into the mixture with a fork or a pastry cutter cutting in simply means combining the butter with the flour until it reaches a crumbly sandy texture be careful not to overwork the butter or it will become too soft and more difficult to work with pour the crumble topping over the apples and bake it for 45 minutes or until golden serve and enjoy as always be sure to exercise caution when handling a knife to avoid injuryto make an apple crumble first pre-heat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit or 175 degrees Celsius then peel and core 5 to 6 apples cut the apples into 1/4 inch or 0.6 centimeter pieces and spread them out on an 8 inch or 20 centimeter baking dish next combine 2/3 cups or 80 grams of flour 2 tablespoons of granulated sugar 1/2 cup or 100 grams of brown sugar and 1/2 teaspoon of cinnamon in a large mixing bowl cut 6 tablespoons of chilled unsalted butter into the mixture with a fork or a pastry cutter cutting in simply means combining the butter with the flour until it reaches a crumbly sandy texture be careful not to overwork the butter or it will become too soft and more difficult to work with pour the crumble topping over the apples and bake it for 45 minutes or until golden serve and enjoy as always be sure to exercise caution when handling a knife to avoid injury

title: How to Make Apple Juice
description:
Make refreshing, homemade apple juice in a few simple steps.  Learn more with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Apple-Juice

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/wikihow/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wikihow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
subtitles: to make apple juice first rinse about 20 apples under cool water then cut each apple into thin slices don't worry about removing the core and seeds since they'll be filtered out later place the slices in a pot and fill the pot with 2 inches 5 centimeters of water bring the water to a boil over medium-high heat reduce the heat to medium cover the pot and let the apples simmer for 20 to 25 minutes place a strainer over a pitcher and pour the apple mixture into the strainer to filter out the seeds skin and apples push the apples down into the strainer with a large spoon to push out more juice finally put the lid on your pitcher and chill the apple juice in the fridge to sweeten your apple juice add one to two teaspoons four to eight grams of sugar at a time until it tastes sweet enough your apple juice should last up to one week in the fridgeto make apple juice first rinse about 20 apples under cool water then cut each apple into thin slices don't worry about removing the core and seeds since they'll be filtered out later place the slices in a pot and fill the pot with 2 inches 5 centimeters of water bring the water to a boil over medium-high heat reduce the heat to medium cover the pot and let the apples simmer for 20 to 25 minutes place a strainer over a pitcher and pour the apple mixture into the strainer to filter out the seeds skin and apples push the apples down into the strainer with a large spoon to push out more juice finally put the lid on your pitcher and chill the apple juice in the fridge to sweeten your apple juice add one to two teaspoons four to eight grams of sugar at a time until it tastes sweet enough your apple juice should last up to one week in the fridge

title: How to Make Banana Bread
description:
Learn How to Make Banana Bread with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Banana-Bread

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make banana bread first pre-heat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit 177 degrees Celsius and lightly grease a loaf pan in a medium bowl whisk together one-and-a-half cups 180 grams of all-purpose flour 1 in 1/4 teaspoon 5 grams of baking soda and 3/4 teaspoon 4 grams of salt then in a separate bowl combine 1 cup 200 grams of dark brown sugar 1/3 cup 85 grams of plain Greek yogurt sour cream or mascarpone a and 1/4 cup 55 grams of room temperature unsalted butter beat the ingredients together with an electric mixer on medium high speed for 4 minutes or until it's light and fluffy add in the flour mixture and beat on low speed until everything is blended next peel and mash 4 large bananas use overripe bananas since they'll make your bread sweet and moist you'll know they're ripe enough when they have black spots on the peel stir the mashed bananas into the batter then fold in 1/2 cup 90 grams of chocolate chips or walnuts if you like finally pour the batter into the loaf pan and bake it for one hour or until a toothpick inserted into it comes out clean let your banana bread cool for one hour before servingto make banana bread first pre-heat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit 177 degrees Celsius and lightly grease a loaf pan in a medium bowl whisk together one-and-a-half cups 180 grams of all-purpose flour 1 in 1/4 teaspoon 5 grams of baking soda and 3/4 teaspoon 4 grams of salt then in a separate bowl combine 1 cup 200 grams of dark brown sugar 1/3 cup 85 grams of plain Greek yogurt sour cream or mascarpone a and 1/4 cup 55 grams of room temperature unsalted butter beat the ingredients together with an electric mixer on medium high speed for 4 minutes or until it's light and fluffy add in the flour mixture and beat on low speed until everything is blended next peel and mash 4 large bananas use overripe bananas since they'll make your bread sweet and moist you'll know they're ripe enough when they have black spots on the peel stir the mashed bananas into the batter then fold in 1/2 cup 90 grams of chocolate chips or walnuts if you like finally pour the batter into the loaf pan and bake it for one hour or until a toothpick inserted into it comes out clean let your banana bread cool for one hour before serving

title: How to Make Banana Cake
description:
Learn How to Make Banana Cake with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Banana-Cake

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make banana cake first pre-heat your oven to 275 degrees Fahrenheit 135 degrees Celsius then in a small bowl mix together one-and-a-half cups 340 grams of mashed bananas and 2 teaspoons 10 milliliters of lemon juice in a separate bowl combine three cups 360 grams of all-purpose flour one and a half teaspoons 9 grams of baking soda and 1/4 teaspoon 1.25 grams of salt set these two bowls aside for now and in a separate bowl cream together 3/4 cup 170 grams of butter and 2 1/8 cups 430 grams of sugar stop once the mixture is light and fluffy then beat in 3 eggs one at a time mixing after each addition once the mixture is well combined mix in 2 teaspoons 10 milliliters of vanilla extract next alternate beating in the flour mixture and one and a half cups 355 milliliters of buttermilk finished by stirring in the banana mixture pour the batter into a 9 by 13 inch 23 by 33 centimeter greased and floured pan bake the cake for one hour you'll know it's done when a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean immediately place the cake in a freezer for 45 minutes to help it cool faster and make it moist if you want to make a frosting for your banana cake cream together half a cup 115 grams of butter and 1 8 ounce 225 gram package of cream in a large bowl then mix in 1 teaspoon 5 milliliters of vanilla extract and beat in 3 half cups 440 grams of confectioner sugar on a low-speed once the sugar is just combined beat the frosting on high speed until it's smooth spread the frosting on your banana cake once it's cooled and enjoyto make banana cake first pre-heat your oven to 275 degrees Fahrenheit 135 degrees Celsius then in a small bowl mix together one-and-a-half cups 340 grams of mashed bananas and 2 teaspoons 10 milliliters of lemon juice in a separate bowl combine three cups 360 grams of all-purpose flour one and a half teaspoons 9 grams of baking soda and 1/4 teaspoon 1.25 grams of salt set these two bowls aside for now and in a separate bowl cream together 3/4 cup 170 grams of butter and 2 1/8 cups 430 grams of sugar stop once the mixture is light and fluffy then beat in 3 eggs one at a time mixing after each addition once the mixture is well combined mix in 2 teaspoons 10 milliliters of vanilla extract next alternate beating in the flour mixture and one and a half cups 355 milliliters of buttermilk finished by stirring in the banana mixture pour the batter into a 9 by 13 inch 23 by 33 centimeter greased and floured pan bake the cake for one hour you'll know it's done when a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean immediately place the cake in a freezer for 45 minutes to help it cool faster and make it moist if you want to make a frosting for your banana cake cream together half a cup 115 grams of butter and 1 8 ounce 225 gram package of cream in a large bowl then mix in 1 teaspoon 5 milliliters of vanilla extract and beat in 3 half cups 440 grams of confectioner sugar on a low-speed once the sugar is just combined beat the frosting on high speed until it's smooth spread the frosting on your banana cake once it's cooled and enjoy

title: How to Make Beef Stew
description:
Learn how to make beef stew with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Beef-Stew

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make beef stew start by cutting some beef into bite-size cubes then sear the beef cubes over medium-high heat for 8 to 10 minutes in a separate pot saute chopped onions and celery for 10 minutes adding minced garlic in for the last 30 seconds when the vegetables are done add tomato paste salt worcestershire sauce flour and wine or beer to the pot as well as the seared beef finally cover and simmer the stew for around two and a half hours adding in chopped potatoes and carrots halfway throughto make beef stew start by cutting some beef into bite-size cubes then sear the beef cubes over medium-high heat for 8 to 10 minutes in a separate pot saute chopped onions and celery for 10 minutes adding minced garlic in for the last 30 seconds when the vegetables are done add tomato paste salt worcestershire sauce flour and wine or beer to the pot as well as the seared beef finally cover and simmer the stew for around two and a half hours adding in chopped potatoes and carrots halfway through

title: How to Make Biscuits
description:
This quick video will give you some tips on how to make easy biscuits -- a perfect accompaniment to your next big meal!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Biscuits

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make biscuits first pre-heat your oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit or 220 degrees Celsius and line a baking sheet with parchment paper then add two and a half cups or 325 grams of flour and two tablespoons or 30 grams of baking soda to a large bowl whisk in 1 tablespoon or 12 and a half grams of sugar and one teaspoon or 6 grams of salt now grate one stick of frozen butter over the bowl using a box grater grading the butter into small pieces will make your biscuits light and airy mix the butter into the flour mixture then create a well in the center pour one cup or 235 milliliters of cold buttermilk into the well and stir until the dough is just combined transfer the dough onto a floured work surface and shape it into a rectangle that's 1 inch or 2 and 1/2 centimeters thick then fold the dough in half and press it into a 1 inch or 2 & a half centimeter thick rectangle again repeat this process two more times so your biscuits have thin flaky layers now cut the dough into two and a half inch or 6 and a half centimeter wide circles using a round cookie cutter or the mouth of a glass place the biscuits on the lined baking sheet and brush the tops with melted butter finally bake the biscuits for 20 minutes or until the tops are slightly goldento make biscuits first pre-heat your oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit or 220 degrees Celsius and line a baking sheet with parchment paper then add two and a half cups or 325 grams of flour and two tablespoons or 30 grams of baking soda to a large bowl whisk in 1 tablespoon or 12 and a half grams of sugar and one teaspoon or 6 grams of salt now grate one stick of frozen butter over the bowl using a box grater grading the butter into small pieces will make your biscuits light and airy mix the butter into the flour mixture then create a well in the center pour one cup or 235 milliliters of cold buttermilk into the well and stir until the dough is just combined transfer the dough onto a floured work surface and shape it into a rectangle that's 1 inch or 2 and 1/2 centimeters thick then fold the dough in half and press it into a 1 inch or 2 & a half centimeter thick rectangle again repeat this process two more times so your biscuits have thin flaky layers now cut the dough into two and a half inch or 6 and a half centimeter wide circles using a round cookie cutter or the mouth of a glass place the biscuits on the lined baking sheet and brush the tops with melted butter finally bake the biscuits for 20 minutes or until the tops are slightly golden

title: How to Make Buttercream Frosting
description:
Learn How to Make Buttercream Frosting with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Buttercream-Frosting

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make buttercream frosting start by cutting one cup or 225 grams of softened butter into cubes and putting it in a bowl then beat or whisk the butter until it's light and fluffy which should take at least 5 minutes once that's finished add 1 and 1/2 cups or 187 grams of confectioner's sugar to the bowl and mix it into the butter when it's fully incorporated add 1 teaspoon or 5 milliliters of vanilla extract and 1 tablespoon or 15 milliliters of cream or milk and continue to beat or whisk everything together finally add 1 and 1/2 more cups or 187 grams of confectioner's sugar and mix the frosting quickly until it's light and fluffyto make buttercream frosting start by cutting one cup or 225 grams of softened butter into cubes and putting it in a bowl then beat or whisk the butter until it's light and fluffy which should take at least 5 minutes once that's finished add 1 and 1/2 cups or 187 grams of confectioner's sugar to the bowl and mix it into the butter when it's fully incorporated add 1 teaspoon or 5 milliliters of vanilla extract and 1 tablespoon or 15 milliliters of cream or milk and continue to beat or whisk everything together finally add 1 and 1/2 more cups or 187 grams of confectioner's sugar and mix the frosting quickly until it's light and fluffy

title: How to Make Candy Apples
description:
Learn how to make candy apples with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Candy-Apples

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to start your candy apples skewer clean apples place them in the refrigerator to chill and cover a baking sheet with wax paper then combine three cups of sugar .5 cups of corn syrup and 1 cup of water over medium high heat when the mixture reaches 330 degrees fahrenheit remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in one to two teaspoons of gel food coloring once the mixture cools dip the first apple into the candy coating and set it on the baking sheet dip the rest of the apples and enjoyto start your candy apples skewer clean apples place them in the refrigerator to chill and cover a baking sheet with wax paper then combine three cups of sugar .5 cups of corn syrup and 1 cup of water over medium high heat when the mixture reaches 330 degrees fahrenheit remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in one to two teaspoons of gel food coloring once the mixture cools dip the first apple into the candy coating and set it on the baking sheet dip the rest of the apples and enjoy

subtitles: to make a simple carrot cake start by mixing sugar oil eggs and vanilla in a bowl in a separate bowl whisk flour cinnamon baking soda and salt then stir the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and add some pineapple raisins walnuts and grated carrots once the batter is ready pour it into a baking pan bake the carrot cake for 1 hour at 350 degrees fahrenheit to learn how to make cream cheese frosting for your carrot cake keep readingto make a simple carrot cake start by mixing sugar oil eggs and vanilla in a bowl in a separate bowl whisk flour cinnamon baking soda and salt then stir the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and add some pineapple raisins walnuts and grated carrots once the batter is ready pour it into a baking pan bake the carrot cake for 1 hour at 350 degrees fahrenheit to learn how to make cream cheese frosting for your carrot cake keep reading

title: How to Make Chapati
description:
Learn How to Make Chapati with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Chapati

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make chapati bread first add 1 cup 130 grams each of whole wheat flour and all-purpose flour to a large bowl then add 1 tsp 6 grams of salt and stir everything together next stir in 2 tablespoons 30 milliliters of olive oil and around 3/4 cup 175 milliliters of hot water gradually add the water until the dough is elastic but not sticky knead the dough until it's smooth then divide it into 10 pieces or more or less depending on how big you want your chapati bread to be shape each piece into a bowl and let them rest for 10 minutes after 10 minutes roll out each ball on a floured work surface until the dough is thin like a tortilla heat a skillet over medium heat until it's hot then place one of the chapatis on it cook the chapati for 30 seconds or until it starts to brown on the bottom then flip it over and cook for 30 more seconds repeat with the rest of the chapati and serve warmto make chapati bread first add 1 cup 130 grams each of whole wheat flour and all-purpose flour to a large bowl then add 1 tsp 6 grams of salt and stir everything together next stir in 2 tablespoons 30 milliliters of olive oil and around 3/4 cup 175 milliliters of hot water gradually add the water until the dough is elastic but not sticky knead the dough until it's smooth then divide it into 10 pieces or more or less depending on how big you want your chapati bread to be shape each piece into a bowl and let them rest for 10 minutes after 10 minutes roll out each ball on a floured work surface until the dough is thin like a tortilla heat a skillet over medium heat until it's hot then place one of the chapatis on it cook the chapati for 30 seconds or until it starts to brown on the bottom then flip it over and cook for 30 more seconds repeat with the rest of the chapati and serve warm

title: How to Make Cheese
description:
Learn How to Make Cheese with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Cheese

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make cheese first line a colander with two layers of cheesecloth then pour one gallon or 3.75 liters of lightly pasteurized milk into a large pot over medium heat stirring frequently to keep it from scorching when the milk comes to a boil reduce the heat to low and stir in 1/2 cup or 120 milliliters of white vinegar once the milk separates into curds and whey pour it into the colander and rinse it with cold water sprinkle the curds with two teaspoons of fine sea salt tie up the cheesecloth and hang it for one to two hours before coarsely chopping the cheese serve and enjoyto make cheese first line a colander with two layers of cheesecloth then pour one gallon or 3.75 liters of lightly pasteurized milk into a large pot over medium heat stirring frequently to keep it from scorching when the milk comes to a boil reduce the heat to low and stir in 1/2 cup or 120 milliliters of white vinegar once the milk separates into curds and whey pour it into the colander and rinse it with cold water sprinkle the curds with two teaspoons of fine sea salt tie up the cheesecloth and hang it for one to two hours before coarsely chopping the cheese serve and enjoy

title: How to Make Deviled Eggs
description:
Learn How to Make Deviled Eggs with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Deviled-Eggs

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make deviled eggs first place six eggs in a saucepan in a single layer cover the eggs with about one and a half inches four centimeters of water then bring the water to a boil when it starts to boil cover the pot reduce the heat to low and cook the eggs for an additional minute now turn off the heat and let the egg sit for about 15 more minutes rinse the eggs under cool water then peel off the shells cut each egg in half lengthwise and use a spoon to scoop the yolks into a bowl place the egg whites on a plate and set aside to make the yolk filling first mash the yolks into small crumbles using a fork then at 1/4 cup 60 grams of mayonnaise and 1 teaspoon 5 milliliters of white vinegar to the bowl add 1 teaspoon 5 grams of mustard 1/8 teaspoon 3/4 gram of salt and a dash of black pepper and stir everything together finally spoon the yolk filling into the egg whites and sprinkle paprika over the eggs and enjoyto make deviled eggs first place six eggs in a saucepan in a single layer cover the eggs with about one and a half inches four centimeters of water then bring the water to a boil when it starts to boil cover the pot reduce the heat to low and cook the eggs for an additional minute now turn off the heat and let the egg sit for about 15 more minutes rinse the eggs under cool water then peel off the shells cut each egg in half lengthwise and use a spoon to scoop the yolks into a bowl place the egg whites on a plate and set aside to make the yolk filling first mash the yolks into small crumbles using a fork then at 1/4 cup 60 grams of mayonnaise and 1 teaspoon 5 milliliters of white vinegar to the bowl add 1 teaspoon 5 grams of mustard 1/8 teaspoon 3/4 gram of salt and a dash of black pepper and stir everything together finally spoon the yolk filling into the egg whites and sprinkle paprika over the eggs and enjoy

title: How to Make Fluffy Scrambled Eggs
description:
Learn How to Make Fluffy Scrambled Eggs with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Fluffy-Scrambled-Eggs

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make fluffy scrambled eggs first crack the eggs directly into an unheated saucepan and add about 1 tablespoon of butter then turn the burner heat to high and stir the eggs continuously while they cook every 30 seconds lift the pan up and hold it off the heat for 10 seconds continue to do this for 3 minutes or until the eggs are silky and slightly runny finally stir in a few tablespoons of milk or cream remove the eggs from the heat before servingto make fluffy scrambled eggs first crack the eggs directly into an unheated saucepan and add about 1 tablespoon of butter then turn the burner heat to high and stir the eggs continuously while they cook every 30 seconds lift the pan up and hold it off the heat for 10 seconds continue to do this for 3 minutes or until the eggs are silky and slightly runny finally stir in a few tablespoons of milk or cream remove the eggs from the heat before serving
